name: Jetpack Joyings
description:
So I started playing around with unreal for my school module and was tasked to create an endless runner. I decided to remake the 2d endless game Jetpack Joyride but in 3D.  I managed to recreate some of the mechanics, such as the laser beam, rockets, and the AI scientist. 

It took me about 1 month to recreate this, and I have never used unreal before, so I tried my best to recreate the mechanics as close to the original as possible. 

* I DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR ANY OF THE ASSETS USED. ALL CREATIVE DIRECTION GOES TO THE ORIGINAL CREATORS
